entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -25.0°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
